My Work

02

Lowcode Engine

The low-code framework uses JSON configuration to generate pages, which can reduce the workload of page development and greatly improve efficiency. Let non-developers create stunning content, and free up developers from pixel-pushing.

Shangpinhui Ecommerce Platform

Shangpinhui is a professional, full-featured, and high-performance e-commerce platform, which provides a series of shopping from product reviews and ratings to the checkout process.

Shangpinhui Backstage System

Shangpinhui backstage management system is an open platform for E-Commerce Store Managers' portals. Powered by a centralized software catalog, the system restores order to your micro-services and infrastructure.
